result.ga: Bhí an ghráin aige ar rugbaí
result.orig: Bhí an ghráin aige ar rugbaí
result.html: Bhí an ghráin aige ar rugbaíHe hated rugby.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ġráin aige ar rugbaíHe hated rugby.

result.ga: Is breá liom rugbaí a imirt
result.orig: Is breá liom rugbaí a imirt
result.html: Is breá liom rugbaí a imirtI love to play rugby.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom rugbaí a imirtI love to play rugby.

result.eng: I haven't the slightest interest in rugby.
result.ga: Níl suim dá laghad agam i rugbaí
result.orig: Níl suim dá laghad agam i rugbaí
result.html: Níl suim dá laghad agam i rugbaíI haven't the slightest interest in rugby.
result.ponchtml: Níl suim dá laġad agam i rugbaíI haven't the slightest interest in rugby.

result.ga: An bhfuil suim agat i rugbaí
